statements: SELECT * FROM network_performance_monitoring LIMIT 10
SELECT id, timestamp, network_device FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE id = 1
SELECT network_device, network_status FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_performance_monitoring
SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM network_performance_monitoring
SELECT DISTINCT network_device FROM network_performance_monitoring
SELECT * FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE network_device LIKE 'Router%'
SELECT AVG(id) FROM network_performance_monitoring
SELECT MIN(id), MAX(id) FROM network_performance_monitoring
SELECT network_device, COUNT(*) FROM network_performance_monitoring GROUP BY network_device
SELECT * FROM network_performance_monitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE network_status = 'UP'
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, MIN(id) AS min_id, MAX(id) AS max_id FROM network_performance_monitoring
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM network_performance_monitoring
SELECT * FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT network_device, network_status FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT network_device, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM network_performance_monitoring GROUP BY network_device HAVING total_count > 5
SELECT * FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE network_device = 'Switch'
SELECT * FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE network_status = 'DOWN'
SELECT network_device, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM network_performance_monitoring GROUP BY network_device ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT id, timestamp, network_device, network_status FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE network_device = 'router' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE network_status = 'down'
SELECT network_device, COUNT(*) FROM network_performance_monitoring GROUP BY network_device HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT network_device, AVG(id) FROM network_performance_monitoring GROUP BY network_device
SELECT DISTINCT network_device FROM network_performance_monitoring ORDER BY network_device ASC
SELECT * FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE network_device LIKE '%switch%'
SELECT network_device, network_status, COUNT(*) FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE network_status = 'up' GROUP BY network_device, network_status
SELECT * FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, timestamp, NOW()) < 3600
SELECT network_device, MAX(id) AS max_id FROM network_performance_monitoring GROUP BY network_device ORDER BY max_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT network_device, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM network_performance_monitoring GROUP BY network_device ORDER BY min_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT network_device, SUM(id) AS total_id FROM network_performance_monitoring GROUP BY network_device
SELECT network_device, NETWORK_STATUS, COUNT(*) AS status_count FROM network_performance_monitoring GROUP BY network_device, network_status HAVING status_count > 5
SELECT network_device, timestamp FROM network_performance_monitoring WHERE network_device = 'firewall' AND DAY(timestamp) = DAY(NOW())
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_ip FROM network_devices WHERE device_status = True;
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_devices WHERE device_status = False;
SELECT * FROM network_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type FROM network_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description FROM network_alerts;
SELECT alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM network_alerts;
SELECT * FROM network_devices JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.alert_id;
SELECT device_name, alert_type FROM network_devices JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.alert_id;
SELECT device_name, alert_description FROM network_devices JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.alert_id;
SELECT device_ip, alert_id FROM network_devices JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.alert_id;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT alert_type, alert_description FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM network_devices WHERE device_status = true;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_ip FROM network_devices WHERE device_status = false;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'router%';
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_devices WHERE device_ip LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM network_devices WHERE device_ip LIKE '10.%' AND device_status = true;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM network_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%switch%' AND device_status = false;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM network_alerts;
SELECT alert_type, alert_description FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_type IN ('critical', 'warning');
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_description LIKE '%error%' AND alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT nd.device_id, nd.device_name, na.alert_type FROM network_devices nd INNER JOIN network_alerts na ON nd.device_id = na.alert_id;
SELECT nd.device_name, COUNT(na.alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM network_devices nd LEFT JOIN network_alerts na ON nd.device_id = na.alert_id GROUP BY nd.device_name;
SELECT nd.device_name AS device, COUNT(na.alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM network_devices nd LEFT JOIN network_alerts na ON nd.device_id = na.alert_id GROUP BY device HAVING COUNT(na.alert_id) > 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, 'ACTIVE' AS device_status_str FROM network_devices WHERE device_status = true;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_status, CASE WHEN device_status THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END AS device_status_str FROM network_devices;

SELECT nd.device_name, COUNT(na.alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM network_devices nd LEFT JOIN network_alerts na ON nd.device_id = na.alert_id WHERE na.alert_type = 'critical' GROUP BY nd.device_name HAVING COUNT(na.alert_id) > 2;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_ip FROM network_devices UNION SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM network_alerts;
SELECT alert_type, COUNT(*) AS num_alerts FROM network_alerts GROUP BY alert_type;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM network_devices nd LEFT JOIN network_alerts na ON nd.device_id = na.alert_id GROUP BY device_name HAVING COUNT(alert_id) > 0;
SELECT device_name, MIN(alert_timestamp) AS first_alert FROM network_devices nd LEFT JOIN network_alerts na ON nd.device_id = na.alert_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, MAX(alert_timestamp) AS last_alert FROM network_devices nd LEFT JOIN network_alerts na ON nd.device_id = na.alert_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices;
SELECT * FROM network_metrics;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, latency_ms FROM network_metrics;
SELECT * FROM network_alerts;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, alert_message FROM network_alerts;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM network_alerts GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Server Room';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM network_metrics WHERE latency_ms > 100;
SELECT device_name, timestamp, alert_message FROM network_devices INNER JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.device_id;
SELECT device_name, timestamp, status_code FROM network_devices LEFT JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM network_devices;
SELECT MAX(latency_ms) AS max_latency FROM network_metrics;
SELECT device_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_seen FROM network_metrics GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT location, AVG(packet_loss) AS avg_packet_loss FROM network_devices INNER JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_message LIKE '%warning%';
SELECT device_id, timestamp, packet_loss FROM network_metrics ORDER BY packet_loss DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, timestamp FROM network_devices INNER JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id WHERE device_name LIKE '%Switch%';
SELECT device_name, location, timestamp FROM network_devices INNER JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id WHERE packet_loss < 0.01;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, location FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, location FROM network_devices WHERE location='Data Center';
SELECT device_name, location, timestamp, latency_ms FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id;
SELECT device_name, location, timestamp, latency_ms FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id WHERE location='Server Room';
SELECT device_name, location, alert_message FROM network_devices JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.device_id;
SELECT device_name, location, alert_message FROM network_devices JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.device_id WHERE alert_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT device_name, location, packet_loss FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id WHERE packet_loss > 5.0;
SELECT device_name, location, status_code FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id WHERE status_code = 500;
SELECT device_name, MAX(latency_ms) AS max_latency FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT location, AVG(packet_loss) AS avg_packet_loss FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id GROUP BY location;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM network_devices;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM network_alerts;
SELECT MIN(latency_ms) AS min_latency, MAX(latency_ms) AS max_latency FROM network_metrics;

SELECT device_name, location, timestamp, latency_ms, packet_loss, status_code, alert_message FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.device_id;

SELECT device_name, location, packet_loss, status_code, alert_message FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.device_id WHERE packet_loss > 2.0 AND status_code = 500;

SELECT device_name, location, timestamp, latency_ms, packet_loss, status_code, alert_message FROM network_devices LEFT OUTER JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id LEFT OUTER JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.device_id;

SELECT device_name, location, timestamp, latency_ms, packet_loss, status_code, alert_message FROM network_devices RIGHT OUTER JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id RIGHT OUTER JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.device_id;

SELECT device_name, location, timestamp, latency_ms, packet_loss, status_code, alert_message FROM network_devices FULL OUTER JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id FULL OUTER JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.device_id;

SELECT device_name, location, timestamp, latency_ms, packet_loss, status_code, alert_message FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM network_alerts);

SELECT device_name, location, timestamp, latency_ms, packet_loss, status_code, alert_message FROM network_devices JOIN network_metrics ON network_devices.device_id = network_metrics.device_id WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_message LIKE '%error%');
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, location FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Office';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic;
SELECT traffic_type, traffic_amount FROM network_traffic;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM network_traffic WHERE traffic_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM network_events;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM network_events;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM network_events WHERE event_type = 'Security';
SELECT * FROM network_alerts;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM network_alerts;
SELECT event_id, timestamp FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT nt.traffic_id, nd.device_name FROM network_traffic nt JOIN network_devices nd ON nt.device_id = nd.device_id;
SELECT ne.event_id, nd.device_name, ne.event_type FROM network_events ne JOIN network_devices nd ON ne.device_id = nd.device_id;
SELECT na.alert_id, ne.event_type, na.alert_type FROM network_alerts na JOIN network_events ne ON na.event_id = ne.event_id;

SELECT nd.device_name, COUNT(na.alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM network_devices nd LEFT JOIN network_events ne ON nd.device_id = ne.device_id LEFT JOIN network_alerts na ON ne.event_id = na.event_id GROUP BY nd.device_name;
SELECT nd.device_name, SUM(nt.traffic_amount) AS total_traffic FROM network_devices nd LEFT JOIN network_traffic nt ON nd.device_id = nt.device_id GROUP BY nd.device_name;
SELECT nd.device_name, AVG(nt.traffic_amount) AS avg_traffic FROM network_devices nd LEFT JOIN network_traffic nt ON nd.device_id = nt.device_id GROUP BY nd.device_name;
SELECT ne.event_type, COUNT(na.alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM network_events ne LEFT JOIN network_alerts na ON ne.event_id = na.event_id GROUP BY ne.event_type;
SELECT nd.device_name, MAX(nt.traffic_amount) AS max_traffic FROM network_devices nd LEFT JOIN network_traffic nt ON nd.device_id = nt.device_id GROUP BY nd.device_name;
SELECT ne.event_type, MIN(na.timestamp) AS earliest_alert FROM network_events ne LEFT JOIN network_alerts na ON ne.event_id = na.event_id GROUP BY ne.event_type;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168%';
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_traffic WHERE traffic_type = 'HTTP';
SELECT device_name, traffic_amount FROM network_traffic WHERE traffic_amount > 1000;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM network_events WHERE event_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name, traffic_amount FROM network_traffic JOIN network_devices ON network_traffic.device_id = network_devices.device_id;
SELECT event_type, timestamp FROM network_events WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM network_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Data Center';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_traffic;
SELECT device_name, traffic_amount FROM network_traffic WHERE traffic_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM network_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_name ILIKE '%switch%';
SELECT event_type, timestamp FROM network_events WHERE event_type = 'Security';
SELECT device_name, traffic_amount FROM network_traffic JOIN network_devices ON network_traffic.device_id = network_devices.device_id WHERE device_name ILIKE '%server%';
SELECT DISTINCT device_name FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, location FROM network_devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE data_usage > 1000;
SELECT traffic_id, timestamp FROM network_traffic WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM network_alerts WHERE created_at >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM network_logs WHERE event_type = 'Error';
SELECT user_id, username FROM network_users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM network_devices;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_traffic;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, location FROM network_devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT alert_type FROM network_alerts;
SELECT user_id, email FROM network_users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_logs WHERE event_type = 'Warning';
SELECT device_id, MAX(data_usage) FROM network_traffic GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_name, data_usage FROM network_devices JOIN network_traffic ON network_devices.device_id = network_traffic.device_id;
SELECT * FROM network_users WHERE role IN ('Admin', 'Operator');
SELECT MIN(data_usage), MAX(data_usage), AVG(data_usage) FROM network_traffic;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, location FROM network_devices WHERE ip_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM network_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-02-01';
SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM network_logs;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'HQ';
SELECT device_name, ip_address, location FROM network_devices WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT traffic_id, timestamp, data_usage FROM network_traffic WHERE data_usage > 1000;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, data_usage FROM network_traffic WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address, location FROM network_devices JOIN network_traffic ON network_devices.device_id = network_traffic.device_id WHERE data_usage > 500;
SELECT traffic_id, device_name, ip_address, location, timestamp FROM network_devices JOIN network_traffic ON network_devices.device_id = network_traffic.device_id WHERE data_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_name = 'Router' OR device_name = 'Switch';
SELECT device_name, location, data_usage FROM network_devices JOIN network_traffic ON network_devices.device_id = network_traffic.device_id WHERE device_name LIKE 'S%' AND location = 'Data Center';
SELECT a.alert_id, a.alert_type, a.alert_message, a.created_at, t.timestamp FROM network_alerts a JOIN network_traffic t ON a.traffic_id = t.traffic_id WHERE a.alert_type = 'High';
SELECT l.log_id, l.event_type, l.event_description, l.timestamp, u.username, u.email FROM network_logs l JOIN network_users u ON l.event_type = u.role;

SELECT nt.traffic_id, nt.timestamp, nt.data_usage, nd.device_name, nd.ip_address, na.alert_type FROM network_traffic nt JOIN network_devices nd ON nt.device_id = nd.device_id JOIN network_alerts na ON nt.traffic_id = na.traffic_id;

SELECT nt.traffic_id, nt.timestamp, nt.data_usage, nd.device_name, nd.location, nl.event_type FROM network_traffic nt JOIN network_devices nd ON nt.device_id = nd.device_id JOIN network_logs nl ON nt.traffic_id = nl.log_id;
SELECT device_id, AVG(data_usage) AS average_usage FROM network_traffic GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT role, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM network_users GROUP BY role;
SELECT device_name, SUM(data_usage) AS total_data_usage FROM network_traffic GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, MAX(data_usage) AS max_data_usage FROM network_traffic GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, MIN(data_usage) AS min_data_usage FROM network_traffic GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT role, AVG(data_usage) AS average_data_usage FROM network_traffic t JOIN network_users u ON t.device_id = u.user_id GROUP BY role;
SELECT device_name, AVG(data_usage) AS average_data_usage FROM network_traffic WHERE data_usage > 500 GROUP BY device_name;
